name: Ultraman: Fighting Evolution
overview: Altman Fighting Evolution 1 is abbreviated as UFE1. It is an Altman acquaintance action game from the PS platform. The game provides three Altman players to choose from, and players can use them to challenge all kinds of monsters. The game's picture is a bit rough now, but the game's simulation level for Altman is quite high, no matter from the action, skill, shape, the game is almost one to one to restore the original, Unfortunately, the game content is not long, only nine monsters play against the players, and there is no main line task, but for Altman fans, the work may be a bit rough, but it is also a worthy Altman fighting game
